job_tasks.phrase: The telecommunications industry, operational inefficiency and customer dissatisfaction are persistent issues, exacerbated by the complexity and volume of tasks that must be managed manually.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the business context and the problems the company is trying to solve using AI.

job_tasks.phrase: Studies show that companies spend up to 30% of their operational budgets on manual task management, often resulting in service downtime and frustrated customers.
job_tasks.justification: This provides business context and quantifies the problem the company is addressing.

job_tasks.phrase: Totogi is revolutionizing this landscape by leveraging cutting-edge, AI-driven systems to automate these tasks, significantly enhancing operational efficiency and customer satisfaction.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the company's strategic approach and its business goals.

job_tasks.phrase: By integrating advanced AI technology with deep technical expertise, we are not just solving problems reactively but proactively reshaping the entire support process.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the business strategy of proactive problem-solving and reshaping processes.

job_tasks.phrase: This approach is exciting because it sets a new standard in customer service efficiency and technical integration, making us a leader in the industry.
job_tasks.justification: This states the business value proposition and market positioning.

job_tasks.phrase: This role is designed for those who thrive in high-tech, innovative environments. It is not a traditional engineering or support role; instead, it combines hands-on technical work with advanced AI tools to proactively optimize and automate complex support tasks.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the nature of the role, emphasizing hands-on technical work combined with AI tools.

job_tasks.phrase: If you excel at scripting, system configuration, and deep technical troubleshooting, and are excited by the prospect of continuously improving processes through technology, this job is for you.
job_tasks.justification: While 'scripting' can be software development, the context of 'improving processes through technology' and the overall job description leans towards using these skills to enhance AI systems.

job_tasks.phrase: In this role, you will be a crucial part of our dynamic team, implementing and managing AI-driven systems to enhance operational efficiency and customer satisfaction.
job_tasks.justification: This directly states the task of implementing and managing AI systems, which falls under software development and operations of those systems.

job_tasks.phrase: You will configure and maintain network functions to ensure seamless service delivery, analyze data to derive actionable insights, and manage incidents to ensure timely resolution.
job_tasks.justification: Configuration and maintenance of network functions, alongside data analysis and incident management, are operational and software-related tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Your work will directly contribute to our strategic decisions and elevate our customer support to new heights.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the impact of the role on strategic decisions and business outcomes.

job_tasks.phrase: AI System Building: Designing and implementing AI-driven systems and monitoring tools to enhance operational efficiency.
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to the core task of building and implementing AI systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Service Configuration and Maintenance: Using AI tools to configure AAA, PCRF, SMSC, and MMSC network functions, ensuring seamless service delivery and customer satisfaction.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the practical application of AI tools to configure and maintain specific network functions, which is a software development and integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: Enhance operational efficiency and customer satisfaction by optimizing and automating tasks using AI-driven systems and advanced technical skills
job_tasks.justification: This phrase summarizes the overarching business goal of the role.

soft_skills.phrase: proactively reshaping the entire support process
manage incidents to ensure timely resolution

classification.rationale: The role emphasizes designing and implementing AI-driven systems, configuring network functions using AI tools, and optimizing processes. While it involves technical work and system configuration, the core focus is on the application and integration of AI, rather than deep model development or MLOps. The mention of 'AI tools' and 'AI-driven systems' aligns with the GenAI Engineer profile, focusing on building applications around AI rather than solely on predictive modeling or traditional software engineering.
